entry.title: ZOLL Stat-padz® II HVP, Multi-Function Adult Electrodes, 2-Year Shelf Life
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zoll
Type: Adult Electrodes
Price: 44.55

ZOLL Stat-padz® are the fastest, easiest-to-use multi-function defibrillator electrodes and are optimized for emergency resuscitation situations. Unique ZOLL features save life-saving seconds and maximize efficacy: Stat Padz II HVP MFE (12) Pair. Multifunction electrodes Stat Padz II to use with AED Plus and AED Pro. These electrodes are designed for use with Zoll Manual defibrillator like the AED Pro.

Features

  • Preconnect™ saves critical application time.
  • Speed Pack™ reduces cord tangles and fumbling.
  • Anatomically correct diagrams facilitate proper pad placement.
  • Improved polymer gel enhances lateral conductivity; results in less skin effects.
  • Center energy feed distributes energy uniformly; reduces edge effect.
  • Gel sponge backing promotes better skin coupling.
  • Differentiated round front and rectangular back pads are diagrammed to facilitate proper pad placement.
  • Compatibility: AED Pro, E Series, M Series, R Series, X Series, AED Plus, CCT

Specification

  • 18 Month shelf life

Ships directly from manufacturer. Ships within 7 business days.

entry.title: Philips AED Wall Mount
entry.summary:
Vendor: Philips
Type: AED Accessories
Price: 98.00

The Wall Mount Bracket is designed specifically for housing a Philips HeartStart defibrillator and its accessories. The defibrillator's carry case can be tethered to the Wall Mount Bracket with a breakaway Secure-Pull Seal (M3859A) to discourage tampering. A broken seal indicates that the defibrillator has been removed from the Wall Mount and accessories may need to be replenished. The Fast Response Kit (68-PCHAT) tucks neatly behind the Defibrillator Case.

entry.title: HeartStart Infant/Child SMART Pads Cartridge, HS1
entry.summary:
Vendor: Philips
Type: HeartStart Battery
Price: 108.00

Philips HeartStart OnSite Infant/Child Cartridge Electrode Pads reduce the energy therapy for younger patients. The Philips HeartStart OnSite Infant/Child Electrodes are meant for children eight years or younger, or for those that weigh less than 55 lbs. 

Philips Heartstart Onsite Infant Child Electrode Pads Cartridge M5072A SMART Pads reduce the defibrillator's shock energy, so that an infant or child suffering sudden cardiac arrest can be treated successfully. The Onsite Infant Child Electrode Pads Cartridge is marked with an indication of the appropriate weight and with a teddy bear icon for ready identification. 

Features:
  • When the Infant/Child Pads Cartridge is installed in the OnSite, the OnSite automatically reduces the defibrillation energy to an energy level more appropriate for infants and children.
  • With the Infant/Child Pads Cartridge inserted, the OnSite automatically reduces the defibrillation energy from the adult dose of 150 joules to 50 Joules and provides optional infant/child CPR Coaching.
  • Electrode placement direction illustrates exactly where to place the electrodes on the victim.
These pads are for Children under 8 years of age or weighing less than 55 pounds (25 kg), including infants. 

Minimum Shelf Life: Replace every two years. Expiration date is noted on pads.

Philips Part Number: M5072A

entry.title: HeartStart Adult SMART Pads Cartridge, HS1
entry.summary:
Vendor: Philips
Type: HeartStart Battery
Price: 67.00

The adult electrode pads for the Philips HeartStart OnSite model come in a convenient and easy-to-use cartridge format. Each cartridge contains 1 set of electrode pads and has the Philips "pull handle" built in. Just snap this new electrode pad cartridge into your Philips HeartStart OnSite AED to make it ready-to-rescue. 

Features:
  • Philips HeartStart AED pads have adapters that snap into place, securing a well-fastened connection.
  • Built in handle that is able to be pulled off for quick access.
  • Visual aid is included on each pad to show proper placement on the SCA victim.
  • Ability to sense when they’ve been removed from their casing and hooked up to a person.
The Philips Heartstart Onsite AED Defibrillator uses two self-adhesive defibrillation/monitoring pads to monitor ECG signals and, if necessary, to deliver defibrillation energy to the patient. These pads (also known as electrodes) are provided in a single-use, disposable package. 

This Adult SMART pads cartridge for Philips OnSite AED are appropriate for cardiac arrest victims weighing 55 pounds or more.
This cartridge contains 1 set of electrode pads and has the Philips "pull handle" built in. 

It is recommended to always have a spare electrode with your AED in case of a second emergency. Also, it is not uncommon for victims of a SCA to produce large quantities of perspiration, or any other factor that may compromise the effectiveness of the AED electrode.

Minimum Shelf Life: Replace every two years. Expiration date is noted on pads.

Philips Part Number: M5071A

entry.title: Heartstart Onsite/FRX AED Battery (Long Life LiMnO2)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Philips
Type: HeartStart Battery
Price: 169.00

Philips HeartStart defibrillator batteries (M5070a) include a 4 year warranty and 5 year shelf life. The battery typically lasts 4 years installed keeping your Philips AED in a "ready to use" condition as well as running mission critical self tests. Using the AED in the course of an emergency rescue or training activity will place a greater drain on the battery and lessen the install life. The Philips HeartStart M5070a defibrillator battery has the capacity to deliver a minimum of 200 shocks or 4 hours of patient monitoring.

entry.title: ZOLL® pedi-padz® II
entry.summary:
Vendor: ZOLL
Type: ZOLL Pediatric Pads
Price: 95.00

ZOLL® Pedi-Padz II are designed for use with the ZOLL AED Plus® and AED Pro®, specifically for pediatric patients who are 8 years or younger and weigh less than 55 pounds. These pediatric defibrillation electrode pads work with ZOLL AEDs to provide the right shock for smaller patients, as ZOLL's Intelligent Pediatric Capability feature in the AED Plus and AED Pro detects that Pedi Padz II are connected and performs a pediatric ECG. 
When Pedi-Padz II are connected, the AED will provide voice and text prompts to alert the person performing the rescue that the AED will detect a child's heartbeat and not an adult's. ZOLL AEDs use different algorithms and energy levels for children and adults to ensure proper and effective treatment is delivered for each patient.
Pedi-Padz II also feature a visual anatomical guide so it's easy for the rescuer to know exactly where to place the pads on the patient. Pedi-Padz II have an expiration date of at least 18 months from date of manufacture and need to be replaced when they expire to keep the AED in working order. 
Pedi-Padz II Specifications
Intelligent Pediatric Capability
Device Energy Levels: 50, 70, 85 joules 
Patient Analysis: Analyzes based on pediatric-specific algorithm 
Backing Material: Closed Cell Polyethylene 
Conductive Gel: Hydrogel
Conductive Element: Tin
Connection Method: Pre-attached 
Packaging: Paper/polyfoil laminate 
Impedance Class: Low
Length, Lead Wires: 34.0 inches / 86.4 cm
Front Electrode
Shape: Round
Diameter, Total: 3.7 inches / 9.4 cm
Area, Total: 10.75 square inches / 69.4 sq cm 
Diameter, Conductive Gel: 2.85 inches / 7.24 cm
Area, Conductive Gel: 6.37 square inches / 41.1 sq cm
Back Electrode
Shape: Rectangular
Length, Total: 5.43 inches / 13.8 cm
Width, Total: 3.5 inches / 8.9 cm
Area, Total: 19.0 square inches / 122.6 sq cm
Length, Conductive Gel: 3.58 inches / 9.1 cm
Width, Conductive Gel: 2.18 inches / 5.5 cm
Area, Conductive Gel: 7.81 square inches / 50.3 sq cm 
Pedi-Padz II are compatible with the following ZOLL AEDs: AED Pro, AED Plus 
For continuity of care once medical professionals take over, Pedi-Padz II are also compatible with the following ZOLL ALS defibrillators: E Series, M Series, R Series, X Series

entry.title: ZOLL Replacement CPR-D-padz
entry.summary:
Vendor: ZOLL
Type: ZOLL Replacement Padz
Price: 169.00

The Zoll® CPR-D-padz® One-Piece Defibrillation and CPR System – item #8900-0800-01, item #DE8900080001 is constructed of the highest quality medical-professional-grade materials and is ideal for mobile medical responders. This one-piece defibrillation and CPR system is easy to place correctly and quickly on the victim using CPR hand placement as the landmark.  The Zoll® CPR-D-padz® One-Piece Defibrillation and CPR System – item #8900-0800-01, item #DE8900080001 includes CPR-D-padz defibrillator electrodes, gloves, barrier mask, scissors, razor, wet and dry wipes and has a 5 year shelf-life. One of the leading causes of the death in the United States is sudden cardiac arrest (SCA), striking indiscriminately people of all ages and fitness levels. Ideal for all mobile first responders, designed to be rugged, reliable and to support you every step of the way, the Zoll® CPR-D-padz® One-Piece Defibrillation and CPR System – item #8900-0800-01, item #DE8900080001.
 
Features:
  • One-piece defibrillation/CPR system with compression depth and rate sensors 
  • System includes: CPR-D-padz defibrillator solid gel electrodes, gloves, barrier mask, scissors, razor, wet wipe, dry wipe
  • Five (5) year shelf-life
 
Compatible defibrillators: 
AED Plus, AED Pro, M Series (Real CPR Help only available on M Series with software v30.0 or higher.), E Series, R Series, Propaq MD, X Series

entry.title: ZOLL Stat-Padz II
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zoll

ZOLL Stat-padz® are the fastest, easiest-to-use multi-function defibrillator electrodes and are optimized for emergency resuscitation situations. Unique ZOLL features save life-saving seconds and maximize efficacy: 

  • Preconnect™ saves critical application time.
  • Speed Pack™ reduces cord tangles and fumbling.
  • Anatomically correct diagrams facilitate proper pad placement.
  • Improved polymer gel enhances lateral conductivity; results in less skin effects.
  • Center energy feed distributes energy uniformly; reduces edge effect.
  • Differentiated round front and rectangular back pads are diagrammed to facilitate proper pad placement.

For compatibility with AED Plus® and AED Pro®, choose Stat padz II, with the same great features as the Stat-padz, but with a specially designed connector that works directly with the AEDs. 


Please note: ZOLL guarantees at least 18 months or better shelf-life on these defibrillation electrode pads.

entry.title: Zoll CPR-D Padz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zoll
Type: CPR-D-padz
Price: 169.00

While the majority of AED pads come with one set of electrodes on two pads that must quickly be placed on the Sternum and Apex of a SCA victim, Zoll knew there must be an easier way. In order to help eliminate confusion and speed up the rescue process, the CPR-D padz were invented. A rescuer need only open up the padz package and place the pre-connected electrode directly in the center of the cardiac arrest victim’s chest. No confusion, no mistakes.This unique one-piece pad incorporates a pressure sensor, known as a “puck,” which allows the rescuer to know in real-time the effectiveness of his CPR compressions and modify his technique accordingly. Compression depth is shown on the Zoll AED Plus’s LCD screen. The AED Plus also responds with voice prompts that gives the rescuer immediate feedback such as “Good Compressions” or “Push Harder.” This advanced technology is enormously significant since most lay people do not compress to the AHA’s recommended depth of 2“.Additionally, the CPR-D Padz don’t just have advanced features, they are also easily maintained. With a shelf-life expiration date and battery expiration date of five (5) years, an attached rescue kit—which includes barrier mask, gloves, razor, scissors, and both a wet and dry wipe, these pads make AED ownership a breeze.

Exp: 8/13/2022
